sentences.sContent: That lathe went out of order at times.
sentences.sContent_eng: That lathe went out of order at times.
sentences.sCn: 那台车床有时发生故障。

sentences.sContent: She can feel the child quickening at times.
sentences.sContent_eng: She can feel the child quickening at times.
sentences.sCn: 她能感到胎儿有时在动。

sentences.sContent: He gets close to wildlife at times, but only when the animals come to him.
sentences.sContent_eng: He gets close to wildlife at times, but only when the animals come to him.
sentences.sCn: 他有时候和野生动物有近距离的接触，但也只是那些动物主动靠近他。
